This game was my childhood. 100/10 game. Literal favourite game of all time. The singleplayer campaign is genuinely the best singleplayer campaign in video game history. The ending gives me goosebumps every time. Wish more games were like this. One of a kind. :D

Why wouldn't you play this game? It still holds up phenomenally well, excellent puzzles, fantastic story and voice acting, great replay value. Also a fairly quick game, and goes on sale for dirt cheap. what do you have to lose

This game will teach you how to think outside the box, literally. The story line is great, the graphics are a huge step up from Portal, and the test chambers are so much larger and nicer. I would recommend this to anyone, worst case scenario, you spent 20$ on something you don't like, and even then you still got to try it. Just buy it, you will probably love it.
